title: Fonz- Huesca- Aragon
author: Katherine Dau
desc: The town of Fonz holds a feast of the Assumption on August 15 every year.

title: Romanos- Zaragoza- Aragon
author: Katherine Dau
desc: On August 25 each year- the town processes to the hermitage of Remedios.

title: Dona Maria- Almeria- Andalucia
author: Katherine Dau
desc: The town holds a festival to the Virgon de los Remedios and St. Teresa from October 12-15 each year.

title: Paterna del Rio- Almeria- Andalucia
author: Katherine Dau
desc: This ermita de los Remedios lies just under a kilometer outside the town of Paterna del Rio.

title: Seron- Almeria- Andalucia
author: Katherine Dau
desc: Seron honors its patron with a 19th century hermitage and plaza named after the Virgin.

title: Chiclana de la Frontera-  Cadiz- Andalucia
author: Katherine Dau
desc: Housed in the Church of San Telmo- the icon of Remedios has a long history in Chiclana de la Frontera.

title: Olvera- Cadiz- Andalucia
author: Katherine Dau
desc: Remedios is said to have rescued Olvera from drought in 1715.

title: Ubrique- Cadiz- Andalucia
author: Katherine Dau
desc: Located in a Capuchin convent- this representation of the Virgin de los Remedios probably originates in the beginning of the 17th century.

title: Belmez- Cordoba- Andalucia
author: Katherine Dau
desc: The current image of Remedios is a product of the twentieth century as the original was destroyed during the Spanish Civil War.

title: Nava del Selpillar (Lucena)- Cordoba- Andalucia
author: Katherine Dau
desc: Although this small town posesses no church there is a confraternity of Los Remedios. The image iteslf is housed in nearby Lucena.

title: Zuheros- Cordoba- Andalucia
author: Katherine Dau
desc: This image of Remedios may originate from the 13th century.
